entry.def: To castrate a male animal or a man means to remove his testicles.

example.ex: In the ancient world, it was probably rare to castrate a dog or cat.
example.tran: 古时可能很少对狗或猫进行阉割。

means.word_mean: 1. neutering a male animal by removing the testicles
2. surgical removal of the testes or ovaries (usually to inhibit hormone secretion in cases of breast cancer in women or prostate cancer in men);
3. the deletion of objectionable parts from a literary work
